======
Oranda
======

A Lightweight and Flexible Ansible Command Line Tool.

To use oranda, follow the following steps:

1. Create a python virtual environment.

.. code-block::

    $ python3 -m venv venv
    $ source venv/bin/activate


2. Install oranda package with pip.

.. code-block::

    $ pip install oranda
